api_list.name: Get video metadata
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://youtube-to-mp34.p.rapidapi.com/metadata/P0PBuWFeTY4"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "youtube-to-mp34.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://youtube-to-mp34.p.rapidapi.com/metadata/{id}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "youtube-to-mp34.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get video's mp3
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://youtube-to-mp34.p.rapidapi.com/video/P0PBuWFeTY4"

            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "youtube-to-mp34.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://youtube-to-mp34.p.rapidapi.com/video/{id}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "youtube-to-mp34.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
